name: Bumpy Spaceman Pro
description:
*Apps On Sale* Get one now while it lasts! Thank You For Playing! Enjoy!
Exploring space gives us significance, the greatest Spaceman is here now!
*No ads, no IAPs, no micro transactions, no crippled gameplay, no data requirements.
*Hover over spaceman to move
*Figure out his movements and react fast
*Never fall
*Created by a developer with a heart

- Game runs on all iPhones (3GS, 4, 4s, 5, 5s, 5c, 6s, 6, 6 Plus, 6s Plus, SE) running iOS 5.1.1 or higher for wide compatibility
- Game runs on all iPods (3rd gen, 4th gen, 5th gen, 6th gen) running iOS 5.1.1 or higher for wide compatibility
- Game runs on all iPads running iOS 5.1.1 or higher for wide compatibility
- Enjoy
